11#import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
12#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/ProvokingVertexHelper.h"
13#include "libANGLE/Display.h"
14#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/DisplayMtl.h"
15#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/shaders/rewrite_indices_shared.h"
16#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_constants.h"
17#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/ContextMtl.h"
18namespace rx
19{
20
21namespace {
22constexpr size_t kInitialIndexBufferSize = 0xFFFF; //Initial 64k pool.
23}
24static inline uint primCountForIndexCount(const uint fixIndexBufferKey, const uint indexCount)
25{
26 const uint fixIndexBufferMode = (fixIndexBufferKey >> MtlFixIndexBufferKeyModeShift) & MtlFixIndexBufferKeyModeMask;
27
28 switch(fixIndexBufferMode)
29 {
30 case MtlFixIndexBufferKeyPoints:
31 return indexCount;
32 case MtlFixIndexBufferKeyLines:
33 return indexCount / 2;
34 case MtlFixIndexBufferKeyLineStrip:
35 return (uint)MAX(0, (int)indexCount - 1);
36 case MtlFixIndexBufferKeyTriangles:
37 return indexCount / 3;
38 case MtlFixIndexBufferKeyTriangleStrip:
39 return (uint)MAX(0, (int)indexCount - 2);
40 default:
41 ASSERT(false);
42 return 0;
43 }
44}
45
46static inline uint indexCountForPrimCount(const uint fixIndexBufferKey, const uint primCount)
47{
48 const uint fixIndexBufferMode = (fixIndexBufferKey >> MtlFixIndexBufferKeyModeShift) & MtlFixIndexBufferKeyModeMask;
49 switch(fixIndexBufferMode)
50 {
51 case MtlFixIndexBufferKeyPoints:
52 return primCount;
53 case MtlFixIndexBufferKeyLines:
54 return primCount * 2;
55 case MtlFixIndexBufferKeyLineStrip:
56 return primCount * 2;
57 case MtlFixIndexBufferKeyTriangles:
58 return primCount * 3;
59 case MtlFixIndexBufferKeyTriangleStrip:
60 return primCount * 3;
61 default:
62 ASSERT(false);
63 return 0;
64 }
65}
66
67static inline gl::PrimitiveMode getNewPrimitiveMode(const uint fixIndexBufferKey)
68{
69 const uint fixIndexBufferMode = (fixIndexBufferKey >> MtlFixIndexBufferKeyModeShift) & MtlFixIndexBufferKeyModeMask;
70 switch(fixIndexBufferMode)
71 {
72 case MtlFixIndexBufferKeyPoints:
73 return gl::PrimitiveMode::Points;
74 case MtlFixIndexBufferKeyLines:
75 return gl::PrimitiveMode::Lines;
76 case MtlFixIndexBufferKeyLineStrip:
77 return gl::PrimitiveMode::Lines;
78 case MtlFixIndexBufferKeyTriangles:
79 return gl::PrimitiveMode::Triangles;
80 case MtlFixIndexBufferKeyTriangleStrip:
81 return gl::PrimitiveMode::Triangles;
82 default:
83 ASSERT(false);
84 return gl::PrimitiveMode::InvalidEnum;
85 }
86}
87ProvokingVertexHelper::ProvokingVertexHelper(ContextMtl * context, mtl::CommandQueue * commandQueue, DisplayMtl *display):
88 mCommandBuffer(commandQueue),
89 mCurrentEncoder(&mCommandBuffer),
90 mPipelineCache(this),
91 mIndexBuffers(true)
92
93{
94 id<MTLLibrary> mtlLib = display->getDefaultShadersLib();
95 mProvokingVertexLibrary = mtlLib;
96 mIndexBuffers.initialize(context, kInitialIndexBufferSize, mtl::kIndexBufferOffsetAlignment, 0);
97 ensureCommandBufferReady();
98
99}
100
101void ProvokingVertexHelper::onDestroy(ContextMtl * context)
102{
103 mIndexBuffers.destroy(context);
104 mPipelineCache.clear();
105}
106
107void ProvokingVertexHelper::commitPreconditionCommandBuffer(ContextMtl * contextMtl)
108{
109 if(mCurrentEncoder.valid())
110 {
111 mCurrentEncoder.endEncoding();
112 }
113 if(mCommandBuffer.valid())
114 {
115 mCommandBuffer.commit();
116 }
117
118 mIndexBuffers.releaseInFlightBuffers(contextMtl);
119
120}
121
122mtl::ComputeCommandEncoder *ProvokingVertexHelper::getComputeCommandEncoder()
123{
124 if (mCurrentEncoder.valid())
125 {
126 return &mCurrentEncoder;
127 }
128
129 ensureCommandBufferReady();
130 return &mCurrentEncoder.restart();
131}
132
133
134
135void ProvokingVertexHelper::ensureCommandBufferReady()
136{
137 if (!mCommandBuffer.valid())
138 {
139 mCommandBuffer.restart();
140 }
141 ASSERT(mCommandBuffer.valid());
142}
143
144static uint buildIndexBufferKey(const mtl::ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &pipelineDesc)
145{
146 uint indexBufferKey = 0;
147 gl::DrawElementsType elementType = (gl::DrawElementsType)pipelineDesc.elementType;
148 bool doPrimPrestart = pipelineDesc.primitiveRestartEnabled;
149 gl::PrimitiveMode primMode = pipelineDesc.primitiveMode;
150 switch(elementType)
151 {
152 case gl::DrawElementsType::UnsignedShort:
153 indexBufferKey |= MtlFixIndexBufferKeyUint16 << MtlFixIndexBufferKeyInShift;
154 indexBufferKey |= MtlFixIndexBufferKeyUint16 << MtlFixIndexBufferKeyOutShift;
155 break;
156 case gl::DrawElementsType::UnsignedInt:
157 indexBufferKey |= MtlFixIndexBufferKeyUint32 << MtlFixIndexBufferKeyInShift;
158 indexBufferKey |= MtlFixIndexBufferKeyUint32 << MtlFixIndexBufferKeyOutShift;
159 break;
160 default:
161 ASSERT(!"Index type should only be short or int.");
162 break;
163 }
164 indexBufferKey |= (uint)primMode << MtlFixIndexBufferKeyModeShift;
165 indexBufferKey |= doPrimPrestart ? MtlFixIndexBufferKeyPrimRestart : 0;
166 //We only rewrite indices if we're switching the provoking vertex mode.
167 indexBufferKey |= MtlFixIndexBufferKeyProvokingVertexLast;
168 return indexBufferKey;
169}
170
171angle::Result ProvokingVertexHelper::getSpecializedShader(rx::mtl::Context *context,
172 gl::ShaderType shaderType,
173 const mtl::ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &pipelineDesc,
174 id<MTLFunction> *shaderOut)
175{
176 uint indexBufferKey = buildIndexBufferKey(pipelineDesc);
177 MTLFunctionConstantValues * fcValues = [[MTLFunctionConstantValues alloc]init];
178 [fcValues setConstantValue:&indexBufferKey type:MTLDataTypeUInt withName:@"fixIndexBufferKey"];
179
180 return CreateMslShader(context, mProvokingVertexLibrary, @"fixIndexBuffer", fcValues, shaderOut);
181}
182//Private command buffer
183bool ProvokingVertexHelper::hasSpecializedShader(gl::ShaderType shaderType,
184 const mtl::ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &renderPipelineDesc)
185{
186 return true;
187}
188
189void ProvokingVertexHelper::prepareCommandEncoderForDescriptor(ContextMtl * context, mtl::ComputeCommandEncoder * encoder, mtl::ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc desc)
190{
191 auto pipelineState = mPipelineCache.getComputePipelineState(context, desc);
192
193 encoder->setComputePipelineState(pipelineState);
194 mCachedDesc = desc;
195}
196mtl::BufferRef ProvokingVertexHelper::preconditionIndexBuffer(ContextMtl * context,
197 mtl::BufferRef indexBuffer,
198 size_t indexCount,
199 size_t indexOffset,
200 bool primitiveRestartEnabled,
201 gl::PrimitiveMode primitiveMode,
202 gl::DrawElementsType elementsType,
203 size_t & outIndexcount,
204 gl::PrimitiveMode & outPrimitiveMode)
205{
206 // Get specialized program
207 // Upload index buffer
208 // dispatch per-primitive?
209 mtl::ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc pipelineDesc;
210 pipelineDesc.elementType = (uint8_t)elementsType;
211 pipelineDesc.primitiveMode = primitiveMode;
212 pipelineDesc.primitiveRestartEnabled = primitiveRestartEnabled;
213 uint indexBufferKey = buildIndexBufferKey(pipelineDesc);
214 uint primCount = primCountForIndexCount(indexBufferKey, (uint32_t)indexCount);
215 uint newIndexCount = indexCountForPrimCount(indexBufferKey, primCount);
216 size_t indexSize = gl::GetDrawElementsTypeSize(elementsType);
217 mtl::BufferRef newBuffer;
218 if(mIndexBuffers.allocate(context, newIndexCount * indexSize,nullptr,&newBuffer) == angle::Result::Stop)
219 {
220 return nullptr;
221 }
222 uint indexCountEncoded = (uint)indexCount;
223 auto threadsPerThreadgroup = MTLSizeMake(MIN(primCount, 64u), 1, 1);
224
225
226 mtl::ComputeCommandEncoder * encoder = getComputeCommandEncoder();
227 prepareCommandEncoderForDescriptor(context, encoder, pipelineDesc);
228 encoder->setBuffer(indexBuffer, (uint32_t)indexOffset, 0);
229 encoder->setBufferForWrite(newBuffer,(uint32_t) indexOffset, 1);
230 encoder->setData(&indexCountEncoded, 2);
231 encoder->dispatch(MTLSizeMake(primCount, 1, 1), threadsPerThreadgroup);
232 outIndexcount = newIndexCount;
233 outPrimitiveMode = getNewPrimitiveMode(indexBufferKey);
234 return newBuffer;
235}
236} // namespace rx
